In general we approach maximum comfort for our clients.

  • Software Requirements

Visual Studio for C++ whereby the version depends to your target Virtools Version :

  • Virtools Dev 4.0.x: “Visual Studio 2003”
  • Virtools Dev 4.1.x: “Visual Studio 2005”
  • Virtools Dev 5.0.x: “Visual Studio 2008”

Notes: Out build generator supports
CodeBlocks with Intel Compilers too
